name: Honor Magic8 Pro
highlights:
Exp. release 2025, October 23
219g, 8.3mm thickness
Android 16, up to 7 major upgrades
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.SIM:
· Nano-SIM + eSIM
· eSIM + eSIM
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM - China
BODY: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO OLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, 4320Hz PWM, Dolby Vision, HDR Vivid, 1800 nits (HBM), 6000 nits (peak)

PLATFORM.OS: Android 16, up to 7 major Android upgrades, MagicOS 10
PLATFORM.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.6, 24mm (wide), 1/1.3", 1.2µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS
200 MP, f/2.6, (periscope telephoto), 1/1.4", 0.56µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS, 3.7x optical zoom
50 MP, f/2.0, 12mm, 122˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.88", 0.61µm, dual pixel PDAF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, color spectrum sensor, LED flash, HDR, panorama

SOUND.Loudspeaker: Yes, with large amplitude stereo speakers

COMMS.Bluetooth: 6.0, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, aptX Lossless, LHDC 5, Auracast, ASHA
COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L1+L5), GLONASS

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), Face ID, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
FEATURES: Emergency SOS via satellite (messages and calls) - China only

BATTERY.Type:
· Si/C Li-Ion 7200 mAh (Global)
· Si/C Li-Ion 6270 mAh (Europe only)
BATTERY.Charging:
120W wired, 100W PPS, 40W UFCS
80W wireless
Reverse wireless
5W reverse wired
